1111.content:
Claire's day couldn't get any more hectic, she already had to check out the park's latest asset and now she gets word that the park's scientists are working on a way to expand the lifespan of the dinosaurs and want her to witness the first demonstration, and on top of all of that her nephews will be arriving to stay with her today, but no one ever said running Jurassic World would be easy.

After meeting with the head scientist of the project the experiment went underway. "Now if our calculations are correct this formula should slow the aging process of the dinosaurs" he said as he crouched down and poured a few drops onto a baby stegosaurus, but before he could continue his explanation the little stegosaurus became frightened from the foriegn substance splashing upon it's snout so in a fit of fear it knocked the vial out of the scientist's hand and onto Claire who had been witnessing the whole ordeal.

(Is the effects gradual or instant?)
1111.title: A experiment gone wrong

11111.content: After cleaning herself up and giving the scientist a verbal thrashing she realized she was late for meeting with her nephews. On her way down to the lobby she could swear her blouse felt looser than it did earlier, but her mind was completely taken off the matter at the sight of her nephews.
11111.title: Gradual

choices: Skip to her reuniting with her nephews
111111.content:
Throughout the day Claire had to keep readjusting her clothes and with all the unfortunate circumstances happening that day she never had time to realize her changes, until she went to alter her outfit to show Owen she was serious she finally got to witness the changes first hand.

As Claire was tying her jacket into a knot around her waistline she stopped in horror as she witnessed her breast receding back into her chest this caused her to let loose a high pitched scream that sounded more like that of a teenager rather than a woman. This of course caught Owen's attention as he turned to face his boss who looked a lot younger than she did a few minutes ago "I know women always try to look young,but something tells me this wasn't the look you had in mind. " He joked, this caused her to look up at him with a face that should have warned any employee they were about to get fired, but now only looked like the face of a pouting spoilt teenager. She then pulled out her phone and stared at her reflection in the glass, after rubbing her hand across many of the freckles that had re-adorn her face she came to the conclusion she must be around the same age as Zach.

"Look, you need to go back especially now with your..." He paused trying to find the right words "Diminished state, there is no way you can make it now." This of course only enraged Claire further "You know I could handle this before, and you know I can handle it now nothing has changed!" She stated as she crossed her arms over her now smaller chest, only for her skirt to collapse around her feet a moment later.
111111.title: Skip to the indominus' escape

11112.content: How young does she get?
11112.title: Instant

info.brief_description: Change the characters from the jurassic park/world films
info.description: Any change you want, AR/AP, Animal, TF, Shrink, all you want.
